854270.name: Fantasy Grounds - Creatures A-Z, Volume 3 (Token Pack)
854270.description:
Creatures A-Z, Vol. 3

Straight out of the SRD, Monster Grin is pleased to present our latest token pack, which contains 65 awesomely illustrated creature images from Fat Goblin Games! That's right, we've partnered with one of the best known providers of creature art out there to bring that same art as tokens to your game and we're working our way through the SRD alphabet from A-Z! This pack contains the following creatures: Black Dragon, Blinkdog, Bodak, Bugbear, and Bulette!
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, silver, green, black or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who and keep your game rockin'!
This token pack includes (ringed in red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue):
  • Black Dragon
  • Blink Dog
  • Bodak
  • Bugbear
  • Bullete
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
